Class Pokemon

  • java.lang.Object
    • Pokemon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Alakazam, Ampharos, Arcanine, Beedrill, Blastoise, Blissey, Butterfree, Charizard, Cloyster, Crobat, Dewgong, Dragonite, Espeon, Feraligatr, Flareon, Gengar, Golduck, Golem, Gyarados, Heracross, Houndoom, Jolteon, Kangaskhan, Kingdra, Machamp, Magneton, Marowak, Meganium, Muk, Nidoking, Nidoqueen, Raichu, Rhydon, Scizor, Skarmory, Snorlax, Tentacruel, Typhlosion, Tyranitar, Umbreon, Vaporeon, Venusaur

    public class Pokemon
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is the super class for all the pokemon
    Author:
    Miguel Habana
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pokemon

        public Pokemon()
        Basic no parameter constructor for the pokemon

      • Pokemon

        public Pokemon(int hp,
               int a,
               int d,
               int spa,
               int spd,
               int s,
               Type t1,
               Type t2)
        This is the constructor for the class Pokemon where in the different stats can be altered
        Parameters:
        hp - the hp stat
        a - the attack stat
        d - the defense stat
        spa - the special attack stat
        spd - the special defense stat
        s - the speed stat
        t1 - the first type of the pokemon
        t2 - the second type of the pokemon
